Intergalactic Friendship Day - On this day, people from all over the world would come together to celebrate their connections with their extraterrestrial friends. They would share stories, exchange gifts, and participate in intergalactic games and activities. Confidence Score: 0.8

The Great Tree Planting Festival - This tradition would involve planting trees in every corner of the world to promote reforestation and raise awareness about the importance of preserving the environment. People would come together to plant trees, share their knowledge and skills, and celebrate the beauty of nature. Confidence Score: 0.9

The Luminous Lantern Parade - On this day, people would carry lanterns made of recycled materials and parade through their neighborhoods, symbolizing the light and hope that they bring to the world. The parade would also feature performances, music, and food. Confidence Score: 0.9

The World Unity Marathon - This tradition would involve people from all over the world running or walking together to promote unity and understanding. Participants would wear uniforms with their country's flag or a symbol of their cultural identity, and the event would end with a grand finale of music and dance. Confidence Score: 0.9

The Night Sky Stargazing Party - On this day, people would gather in open spaces to gaze at the stars together, share their knowledge of astronomy, and enjoy music and food under the night sky. It would be a time to appreciate the beauty of the universe and the connections that bind us together. Confidence Score: 0.8
